strapiPost.title: Mercy Does it Again
strapiPost.content:
And now they're just showing off... Mercy Hospital Northwest Arkansas in Rogers receives another award they can hang on the fridge - an A grade from the Leapfrog Group.

  • Leapfrog Group: a nonprofit watchdog (or better yet, watchfrog) organization that serves as a voice for health care consumers and purchasers using their influence to positively change healthcare.
  • The grade considers a combination of metrics in its ranking system, including the hospital's error prevention acumen, injuries, accidents, and infections. The grade runs from A to F. Just like in school, you don't want to end up in a F category.

You can find the full list of hospital ratings HERE.
